name: which-key
title: Which Key
description: Which-Key for Raycast dynamically displays available keybindings as you type, helping you discover and remember keyboard shortcuts effortlessly.  You can specify custom keybindings within the extension to suit your workflow.
author: romainmartinez

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
